params.name: hidden_size
params.description: The dimensionality of the hidden layers.

params.name: vocab_size
params.description: The size of the vocabulary.

params.name: num_mel_bins
params.description: The number of mel filters used in the filter bank.

params.name: encoder_num_attention_heads
params.description: The number of attention heads in the encoder.

params.name: encoder_layers
params.description: The number of layers in the encoder.

params.name: encoder_linear_units
params.description: The number of units in the linear layer of the encoder.

params.name: decoder_layers
params.description: The number of layers in the decoder.

params.name: decoder_num_attention_heads
params.description: The number of attention heads in the decoder.

params.name: decoder_linear_units
params.description: The number of units in the linear layer of the decoder.

params.name: speech_decoder_postnet_layers
params.description: The number of layers in the post-net of the speech decoder.

params.name: speech_decoder_postnet_units
params.description: The number of units in the post-net layers of the speech decoder.

params.name: speech_decoder_postnet_kernel
params.description: The kernel size in the post-net of the speech decoder.

params.name: positionwise_conv_kernel_size
params.description: The size of the convolution kernel used in the position-wise layer.

params.name: encoder_normalize_before
params.description: Specifies whether to normalize before encoder layers.

params.name: decoder_normalize_before
params.description: Specifies whether to normalize before decoder layers.

params.name: encoder_concat_after
params.description: Specifies whether to concatenate after encoder layers.

params.name: decoder_concat_after
params.description: Specifies whether to concatenate after decoder layers.

params.name: reduction_factor
params.description: The factor by which the speech frame rate is reduced.

params.name: speaking_speed
params.description: The speed of the speech produced.

params.name: use_macaron_style_in_conformer
params.description: Specifies whether to use macaron style in the conformer.

params.name: use_cnn_in_conformer
params.description: Specifies whether to use convolutional neural networks in the conformer.

params.name: encoder_kernel_size
params.description: The kernel size used in the encoder.

params.name: decoder_kernel_size
params.description: The kernel size used in the decoder.

params.name: duration_predictor_layers
params.description: The number of layers in the duration predictor.

params.name: duration_predictor_channels
params.description: The number of channels in the duration predictor.

params.name: duration_predictor_kernel_size
params.description: The kernel size used in the duration predictor.

params.name: energy_predictor_layers
params.description: The number of layers in the energy predictor.

params.name: energy_predictor_channels
params.description: The number of channels in the energy predictor.

params.name: energy_predictor_kernel_size
params.description: The kernel size used in the energy predictor.

params.name: energy_predictor_dropout
params.description: The dropout rate in the energy predictor.

params.name: energy_embed_kernel_size
params.description: The kernel size used in the energy embed layer.

params.name: energy_embed_dropout
params.description: The dropout rate in the energy embed layer.

params.name: stop_gradient_from_energy_predictor
params.description: Specifies whether to stop gradients from the energy predictor.

params.name: pitch_predictor_layers
params.description: The number of layers in the pitch predictor.

params.name: pitch_predictor_channels
params.description: The number of channels in the pitch predictor.

params.name: pitch_predictor_kernel_size
params.description: The kernel size used in the pitch predictor.

params.name: pitch_predictor_dropout
params.description: The dropout rate in the pitch predictor.

params.name: pitch_embed_kernel_size
params.description: The kernel size used in the pitch embed layer.

params.name: pitch_embed_dropout
params.description: The dropout rate in the pitch embed layer.

params.name: stop_gradient_from_pitch_predictor
params.description: Specifies whether to stop gradients from the pitch predictor.

params.name: encoder_dropout_rate
params.description: The dropout rate in the encoder.

params.name: encoder_positional_dropout_rate
params.description: The positional dropout rate in the encoder.

params.name: encoder_attention_dropout_rate
params.description: The attention dropout rate in the encoder.

params.name: decoder_dropout_rate
params.description: The dropout rate in the decoder.

params.name: decoder_positional_dropout_rate
params.description: The positional dropout rate in the decoder.

params.name: decoder_attention_dropout_rate
params.description: The attention dropout rate in the decoder.

params.name: duration_predictor_dropout_rate
params.description: The dropout rate in the duration predictor.

params.name: speech_decoder_postnet_dropout
params.description: The dropout rate in the speech decoder postnet.

params.name: max_source_positions
params.description: if relative position embeddings are used, defines the maximum source input positions.

params.name: use_masking
params.description: Specifies whether to use masking in the model.

params.name: use_weighted_masking
params.description: Specifies whether to use weighted masking in the model.

params.name: num_speakers
params.description: Number of speakers. If set to > 1, assume that the speaker ids will be provided as the input and usespeaker id embedding layer.

params.name: num_languages
params.description: Number of languages. If set to > 1, assume that the language ids will be provided as the input and use thelanguge id embedding layer.

params.name: speaker_embed_dim
params.description: Speaker embedding dimension. If set to > 0, assume that speaker_embedding will be provided as the input.

params.name: is_encoder_decoder
params.description: Specifies whether the model is an encoder-decoder.
